trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time there is a new event scheduled for one of your clubs.
This Trigger fires every time you complete a new activity on Strava.

trigger: New activity by you with photo
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you complete a new activity that includes a photo.
This Trigger fires every time you star a segment on Strava.
This Trigger fires every time you create a new route on Strava.
